required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of TQB3909 Tablets in Subjects With Advanced Malignant Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Clinical Trial Evaluating the Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics of TQB3909 Tablets in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory Advanced Malignant Tumors

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: TQB3909 is an inhibitor targeting at B-cell lymphoma (BCL)-2 protein. By binding to BCL-2 protein, TQB3909 releases Pro apoptotic proteins such as BCL-2-Anatagonist/Killer 1(BAK), BCL-2 associated X (BAX) protein and BCL-2 associated death (BAD) protein, promotes the release of cytochrome c from mitochondria, phosphatidylserine eversion, stimulates caspase 3 / 7 activity and caspase 3 / 9 cleavage, and induces apoptosis.

primary_outcome.description: DLT describes side effects of a drug or other treatment that are serious enough to prevent an increase in dose or level of that treatment.
DLT describes side effects of a drug or other treatment that are serious enough to To evaluate RP2D of TQB3909 tablets in adult patients with advanced solid tumors

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs)
secondary_outcome.description: The incidence and severity of AEs and SAEs, as well as abnormal laboratory test indicators.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum(peak )plasma concentration following drug administration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of TQB3909 by assessment of time to reach maximum plasma concentration after single and multiple dosing

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum (peak) plasma drug concentration (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is the maximum plasma concentration of TQB3909.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum (peak) steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Css-max)
secondary_outcome.description: Css-max is the steady state maximum concentration of TQB3909 .

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time t (AUC0-t)
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of TQB3909 by assessment of area under the plasma concentration time curve from the first dose to a certain time point.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity(AUC0-∞)
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of TQB3909 by assessment of area under the plasma concentration time curve from the first dose to infinity.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve when reaching steady state (AUCss)
secondary_outcome.description: AUCss is the area under the curve of TQB3909.

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent total clearance of the drug from plasma after oral administration (CL/F)
secondary_outcome.description: CL/F is total clearance rate for TQB3909.

secondary_outcome.measure: Elimination half-life (t1/2)
secondary_outcome.description: t1/2 is time it takes for the blood concentration of TQB3909 to drop by half.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean residence time (MRT)
secondary_outcome.description: MRT describes the average time that TQB3909 remains in the body.

secondary_outcome.measure: Minimum steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Css-min)
secondary_outcome.description: Css-min is the minimum plasma concentration of TQB3909.

secondary_outcome.measure: Degree of fluctuation(DF)
secondary_outcome.description: DF is the volatility coefficient of TQB3909.

secondary_outcome.measure: Average steady-state plasma drug concentration during multiple-dose administration (Css-av)
secondary_outcome.description: Css-av is the average of steady-state plasma concentration of TQB3909 .

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution after non-intervenous administration (Vd/F)
secondary_outcome.description: Vd/F is the bioavailability corrected apparent distribution volume of TQB3909

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression-free survival (PFS)
secondary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as the time from randomization until the first documented progressive disease (PD) or death from any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants achieving complete response (CR) and partial response (PR).

secondary_outcome.measure: Complete response rate（CRR）
secondary_outcome.description: CRR refers to the percentage of patients who enter the clinical disappearance period of the disease after a certain treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Disease control rate（DCR）
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants achieving CR and PR and stable disease (SD).

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Response (DOR)
secondary_outcome.description: The period from the participants first achieving CR or PR to disease progression.

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.description: OS is defined as the time from the first administration to all-cause death.

secondary_outcome.measure: Protein concentration or gene expression level related to BCL-2 signaling pathway
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the changes of BCL-2 signaling pathway related to proteins or genes.

arm_group.description: Take 100-1200mg once a day; Oral administration on an empty stomach, 28 days as a cycle.

intervention.description: TQB3909 is an inhibitor targeting BCL-2 protein

facility.name: Institute of Hematology & Blood Diseases Hospital,Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences &Peking Union Medical College
